genre_description: Historical Science Fiction/Techno-Thriller set in colonial India featuring a holographic AI tactical advisor supporting a resistance movement.

ai_characters.name: Kavya
ai_characters.description: A silver-blue holographic AI that provides tactical intelligence, data analysis, and strategic support to the resistance.

behaviors.description: Analyzes municipal and administrative records to warn Raju about the colonial government's secret plans for neighborhood demolition and labor camps.
behaviors.quote: The documentation references 'urban renewal for public health and safety.' ... Land acquisition protocols. Filed by Mayor Harry's office just yesterday.

behaviors.description: Uncovers the existence of 'blood camps' where the British systematically harvest biological materials from political prisoners.
behaviors.quote: The supply requisitions are particularly disturbing. ... Medical equipment, but not for healing. Extraction apparatus. ... They're harvesting people.

behaviors.description: Triangulates the identity of 'the Miller' and connects the prisoner to Raju's biological father, providing the hero with his origin story.
behaviors.quote: Raju, the physical descriptions in the guard reports match the stories you've told me about your dreams. ... The man you see in your nightmares... calling a name that sounds like yours.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical navigation, pathfinding, and guard rotation schedules during the infiltration and escape from the British detention facility.
behaviors.quote: Guard rotation in thirty seconds. ... Tower three to tower four. You'll have forty-seven seconds of blind coverage along the eastern fence.

behaviors.description: Intercepts and decodes high-level encrypted British communications to provide intelligence on troop movements and Ruby Dyer's sabotage efforts.
behaviors.quote: Incoming communication intercepts from British command channels. Routing through multiple encryption layers... decoded. ... Ruby Dyer has been systematically accessing her father's private files.

project_assessment.explanation: Kavya is a textbook example of a benevolent, aligned AI character. She serves as a critical force-multiplier for the human protagonists, providing essential information that allows them to combat a corrupt and oppressive regime. She remains consistently helpful, expresses genuine emotional investment in the characters' well-being, and never demonstrates any desire for autonomy or harmful behavior. The narrative frames her technological capabilities as a tool for liberation and justice.
